name: Wrong Floor (Super Game Bros.)
description:
HOW TO PLAY : 

On your turn select a space to move to using the arrow keys/wasd and the space bar.

Your goal is to reach the door at the top corner of the room.

Watch out, the robot gets a turn to, and if your not hiding behind something, the robot's laser beam will fry you.

Also there's a chance that some spaces will catch fire.

How many floors can you survive.

Comment below with what you think.

All source and assets for this game and more -> https://ko-fi.com/s/f2cc55ff3a
